mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer WHERE hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq} ORDER BY cust_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (hotel_seq, cust_name, cust_pw, cust_phone, cust_email, cust_rating, signup_date) VALUES (#{hotel_seq}, #{cust_name}, #{cust_pw}, #{cust_phone}, #{cust_email}, #{cust_rating}, current_date)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pickdrop p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.cust_seq = c.cust_seq WHERE p.hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq} ORDER BY p.pd_seq DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO pickdrop (hotel_seq, reserv_seq, cust_seq, personnel, add_date, want_date, start_address, start_point_width, start_point_height, end_address, end_point_width, end_point_height)
VALUES (#{hotel_seq}, #{reserv_seq}, #{cust_seq}, #{personnel}, current_date, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{want_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{start_address}, #{start_point_width}, #{start_point_height}, #{end_address}, #{end_point_width}, #{end_point_height})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pickdrop p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.cust_seq = c.cust_seq LEFT JOIN (SELECT re.*, h.room_num FROM reservation re LEFT JOIN HRM h ON re.hrm_seq = h.hrm_seq ) r ON p.cust_seq = r.cust_seq WHERE p.hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq} AND p.pd_seq=${pd_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE pickdrop SET complete_check=true WHERE hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq} AND pd_seq=#{pd_seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pickdrop WHERE hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq} AND pd_seq=#{pd_seq}
